id: Build With Me: Weekly Planner Notion Template
name: Build With Me: Weekly Planner Notion Template
description: Enter code WEEKLY100 to get this for FREE. We do this to prevent bots from accessing all of our templates. Although it's free, we'd also greatly appreciate any donations to continue doing this ❤️Welcome to our Weekly Planner Notion Template (+ Build With Me Tutorial)This is a simple template that we designed to teach you how to use and build Notion pages! This template includes two separate databases: One for your weekly plans and one for your monthly plans. We hope you enjoy this tutorial!What'
features: Video on How to Build; Pre-built Weekly Planner Notion Template
